overview:
After his mechanical engineering studies in Stuttgart, Germany, and his MBA from New York University, USA, Steffen Goerig started his career with an American Investment Bank within their Mergers & Acquisitions department in London.

After a couple of years he acquired his first company, a mechanical engineering company, out of receivership. After a successful turnaround and six years of continuous improvements he was able to sell this company to a northern European industrial holding company. Subsequently, Steffen Goerig worked for several different international industrial enterprises as Managing Director responsible for their business development and turn-around. In all cases, after a short re-development phase, the ailing company was able to break-even.
